original: 審視分析、膽識過人，然果斷急躁「愚民不可共計大事。」力勸曹操殺暫歸附的劉備，缺糧強徵混人肉乾等傳聞...
text: Examining and analyzing, he is bold and insightful, but he is decisive and impatient. "Fools can't count the big things together." urged Cao Cao to kill Liu Bei, who was temporarily attached to him, and rumors such as the lack of food forcing mixed jerky...
